```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```


```{r}
library(taskscheduleR)
```

```{r}
#create function that shows todays date for output
today <- function() {
  today <- Sys.Date()
  return(today)
}
```




```{r}
#create file path to new script
myscript <- sprintf('~/GitHub/ALS-Data-Cleaning-Tool/Report/water_report_%s.html', 
                       format(today(), format = "%m-%d-%y"))

taskscheduler_create(taskname = "myfancyscripttest", rscript = myscript, 
                     schedule = "DAILY", starttime = "08:00", startdate = format(Sys.Date()+1, "%d/%m/%Y"))


```
